edu.uweo.java2.assignment9

Class AbstractCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uweo.java2.assignment9.AbstractCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddCommand, DivCommand, MulCommand, NAKCommand, ShutdownCommand, SubCommand

    public abstract class AbstractCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Superclass for command objects.
    Author:
    slajaunie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractCommand

        public AbstractCommand()
        Default constructor- sets operand1 and operand2 values to the BigDecimal value of 0. Sets the values of workMillisMin and workMillisMax to 0.

      • AbstractCommand

        public AbstractCommand(java.math.BigDecimal operand1,
                       java.math.BigDecimal operand2,
                       double workMillisMin,
                       double workMillisMax)
                throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        Constructs a new AbstractCommand using the given BigDecimal operands. If either operand is null, throws a NullPointerException
        Parameters:
        operand1 - The first operand
        operand2 - The second operand
        workMillisMin - the minimum boundary for the randomly-selected length of time (in milliseconds) that the command will begin to execute
        workMillisMax - the maximum boundary for the randomly-selected length of time (in milliseconds) that the command will begin to execute
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if either operand is null
